summary: The digital banking app's transfer flow abandonment rose 55% quarter-over-quarter at confirmation, Android 12 image uploads crash at 3.2% rate, and new user retention dropped 18% to 31%. Fraud operations report 0.9% chargeback rate (up from 0.6%) with spikes in card-not-present grocery transactions and 7% KYC failure rate due to biometric errors in low-light conditions. Enterprise clients face 18-day median API onboarding delays, 42 open tickets, and 3 paused rollouts due to SOC2 compliance gaps. Dark mode adoption at 85
